short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dreamer Technologies LeadsLink for Suite-SugarCRM Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Push the LinkedIn Information as a Lead into SuiteCRM. All the necessary fields will be automatically filled into the chrome extension Lead form so you need to just click on save. and it will push the lead into your SuiteCRM.

This addon helps you to save your LinkedIn Leads at one click into your SuiteCRM and then manage everything in your SuiteCRM.

=> Supports the latest LinkedIn UI Design <==

[[ Key Points ]]

- Eliminate the copy-paste
- Increase the speed of import the leads from LinkedIn
- One click lead import
- Reduces sales managers time in gathering information.
